channel.title: || RuneTurbo || 666 || Economy ||
channel.description:
[CENTER] Banner Coming soon.
Alright well I've grown old of creating oldschool servers and creating 317's loading 600+ so now I've decided to actually make a 742 instead of wasting time on look-alikes. I've also figured that the old revisions are limited and have almost no possibility for creativity in my opinion that is. This is my first ever 666 Project so please don't be so harsh.
Base : Matrix (Original Release) Client : 718 Client
Yes Iam basing this off of Matrix as it seems like a nice learning source.
[B]Update Log[/B][CODE] [06/05/2013] - Added all slayer masters with correct slayer levels, and rewards [06/06/2013] - Packaged the source much better and efficent [06/06/2013] - Improved a few bosses [Droprates/Attack/Defence bonuses] [06/07/2013] - Home area moved to Falador [06/07/2013] - Removed many donator features. [06/08/2013] - Content Deleted [Queen Black dragon, Clan wars, duel arena, dominion tower] [06/08/2013] - Barrows slightly updated, chest teleporting rocks etc.. [06/08/2013] - Ring of wealth added [06/08/2013] - Mystery Boxes [Random item] [06/08/2013] - Fixed attack accuracy on Zamorakian spear [06/08/2013] - Tormented demons [Small bug, sometimes if you were attacking with ranged and it was praying melee it would not hit] [06/08/2013] - Slayer Rewards almost complete [06/08/2013] - Switch command added to switch from higher revision item graphics to lower revision item graphics. [09/08/2013] - Added a lot of npc spawns [Brimhaven, EdgeVille, Godwars] [09/08/2013] - Fixed Nulls at godwars [09/08/2013] - Stopped working on Clanwars to fix a couple bugs [09/08/2013] - Basic stalls have been added [09/08/2013] - Npc pickpocketing added still need to add more npcs. [09/08/2013] - Chance to recieve double, triple loot with a higher thieving level. [09/08/2013] - Frost Dragon resource dungeon added (requires 85 slayer) [09/08/2013] - Al-kharid mining resource dungeon added (requires 75 mining) [09/08/2013] - Seers Village woodcutting resource dungeon added (requires 60 woodcutting) [09/08/2013] - Fixed Nex 1-hitting players with protection prayers [10/08/2013] - Vecna Skull added with correct waiting and effectt [10/08/2013] - BoneCrusher added [10/08/2013] - Polypore staff creation added [10/08/2013] - Starters limited to 2 accounts from the same ip [10/08/2013] - New players will recieve x2 Deathtouched darts, they can only one-hit npc's not regular players, they are also untradeable [10/08/2013] - Yk'Lagor the thunderous added, thanks to a snippet from BongoProd I have figured out how to add combat scripts. [11/08/2013] - Mr Ex will now give you a Wildstalker Helm corresponding to you're wilderness kills. [13/08/2013] - Fishing has been redone with support for almost every fish [13/08/2013] - Fishing guild has been added [13/08/2013] - Nex has been optimized just can't seem to get the last wave properly. [15/08/2013] - Started on a Day-Z based known as ZombieZ [16/08/2013] - Minimap Blacked out in ZombieZ [16/08/2013] - Pvp added to ZombieZ [16/08/2013] - Items will be dropped in ZombieZ [16/08/2013] - You must find a key which will be spawned in one of the 4-5 random locations. [16/08/2013] - Once you find the key you'll be able to leave the minigame whilst collecting you're reward [16/08/2013] - There are 3 Safe Havens within the minigame each with their own bank [/CODE]
[b]Developers[/b]
[ul][li]Mod Jay[/li] [li]Mod Dustin[/li][/ul]
[B]Media[/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/3yaw9.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3yOYU.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3yPgc.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3yKV1.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3Apxk.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3ApPe.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3Aq4Q.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3ASH0.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EfXF.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_QYWmiGtC-k [/center]

item.title: || RuneTurbo || 666 || Economy ||
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

[quote=“rooneyscape, post:13, topic:524066”][quote author=thakillah link=topic=642613.msg4330866#msg4330866 date=1373641389]

2 Diffrent GameFrames…

When the first image was posted it was still a 666.

Then delete those? its confusing…
[/quote]

Deleted

Updates

[13/08/2013] - Fishing has been redone with support for almost every fish
[13/08/2013] - Fishing guild has been added
[13/08/2013] - Nex has been optimized just can’t seem to get the last wave properly.

Mind the bugs please will be resorted

More Updates!

[15/08/2013] - Started on a Day-Z based known as ZombieZ
[16/08/2013] - Minimap Blacked out in ZombieZ
[16/08/2013] - Pvp added to ZombieZ
[16/08/2013] - Items will be dropped in ZombieZ
[16/08/2013] - You must find a key which will be spawned in one of the 4-5 random locations.
[16/08/2013] - Once you find the key you'll be able to leave the minigame whilst collecting you're reward
[16/08/2013] - There are 3 Safe Havens within the minigame each with their own bank

[/quote]

Yet again 2 diffrent gameframes…

Read full topic

item.title: || RuneTurbo || 666 || Economy ||
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:524066”][quote author=rooneyscape link=topic=642613.msg4328194#msg4328194 date=1373311158]

Not sure what i’m looking at in that picture…

Nothing really i just needed a picture so my thread wouldn’t get taken down, or is that the advertisement section?

Updates

[06/08/2013] - Content Deleted [Queen Black dragon, Clan wars, duel arena, dominion tower] [06/08/2013] - Barrows slightly updated, chest teleporting rocks etc.. [06/08/2013] - Ring of wealth added [06/08/2013] - Mystery Boxes [Random item] [06/08/2013] - Fixed attack accuracy on Zamorakian spear [06/08/2013] - Tormented demons [Small bug, sometimes if you were attacking with ranged and it was praying melee it would not hit]
[/quote]You are thinking of r-s lol[/quote]

Uhm what sorry? I’am Roone on r-s

More updates

[09/08/2013] - Frost Dragon resource dungeon added (requires 85 slayer)
[09/08/2013] - Al-kharid mining resource dungeon added (requires 75 mining)
[09/08/2013] - Seers Village woodcutting resource dungeon added (requires 60 woodcutting)
[09/08/2013] - Fixed Nex 1-hitting players with protection prayers
[10/08/2013] - Vecna Skull added with correct waiting and effectt
[10/08/2013] - BoneCrusher added
[10/08/2013] - Polypore staff creation added
[10/08/2013] - Starters limited to 2 accounts from the same ip
[10/08/2013] - New players will recieve x2 Deathtouched darts, they can only one-hit npc’s not regular players, they are also untradeable
[10/08/2013] - Yk’Lagor the thunderous added, thanks to a snippet from BongoProd I have figured out how to add combat scripts.

Read full topic
